dataList.eventDesc:
We returned to the Training Team hallways again.

According to the Work Education manual, we're going to need the Physical Intervention Shield to survive the Noon of Violet's shockwave.

We stood huddled together at the hallway, remembering what Hod, the Sephirah of the Training Team told us. It wasn't long before the same bullets from earlier struck us.

Red barriers began to form around the Sinners who were struck by the bullets.

'Let's see... According to the schedule, we have some time until the next Noon arrives.'

One of the Sinners noticed an Emergency Response manual posted on the hallway walls.

On it were instructions on how to use a console installed in the hallways to activate the Regenerator systems connected to the Safety Team.

'This seems like it'd be worth a try.'

If we hurry, we might be able to activate the Regenerator before the Noon arrives.
successDesc:
{0}'s face lights up as they read the manual.

Soon, an announcement lets us know that the Regenerator Distinguisher has been modified, reactivating most functionalities of the Regenerator.
failureDesc:
{0}'s face grows darker as they read and reread the manual.

They must've hit a wall; they kept squinting at the paper for a while...

... and eventually, {0} managed to reactivate the basic functionalities of the Regenerator.

There isn't much time until the next Ordeal.

There isn't any more time for us to struggle with this console. We hurried back to the lobby.

successDesc:
Looking through the webs reveals... small spiders crawling within.

And that they were no mere spiderweb.

The darkness that devoured the floor lights up, red eyes glowing and teeming.

[{0}] manages to tear their eyes away from the red eyes and begin observing the fizzling generator. Thankfully, it doesn't take much time before a malfunctioning part is identified.

[{0}] carefully removes the malfunctioning part...

... and all of a sudden, the generator stops fizzling, and the door of the containment unit slams shut.

Spiders begin crawling onto [{0}].
failureDesc:
Looking through the webs reveals... small spiders crawling within.

And that they were no mere spiderweb.

The darkness that devoured the floor lights up, red eyes glowing and teeming.

[{0}] manages to tear their eyes away from the red eyes and begin observing the fizzling generator. Thankfully, it doesn't take much time before a malfunctioning part is identified.

[{0}] yanks out the malfunctioning part, and the containment unit echoes with a heavy, resounding noise.

A few spiders, spooked by the noise, lunge and bite at the Sinners.

successDesc:
'It is a terrible strategy to mess with gas you don't know the effects of! I say that we leave the gas and take only the Enkephalin.'

'Hmph, you don't know what you're blathering about.'

The Sinners soon split into two parties and begin arguing with one another.

When the argument began to turn into an extended debate, [{0}] picked up both the Enkephalin and the gas canister.

'I should've just done that from the get-go instead of letting you guys waste time at loggerheads.'

We must've wasted too much time in there.

Upon exiting the corridor, we're greeted by a giant something rushing in our direction from where we were earlier.

We quickly ran the other way.
failureDesc:
'It is a terrible strategy to mess with gas you don't know the effects of! I say that we leave the gas and take only the Enkephalin.'

'Hmph, you don't know what you're blathering about.'

The Sinners soon split into two parties and begin arguing with one another.

When the argument began to turn into an extended debate, [{0}] picked up both the Enkephalin and the gas canister.

'Mm. Our departure was overly delayed.'

We must've wasted too much time in there.

Upon exiting the corridor, we're greeted by a giant something rushing in our direction from where we were earlier.

It's too late to run.

successDesc:
[{0}] prays before the skull.

To whom they pray, we cannot hear.

For what they pray, we cannot hear.

We cannot know if that even was a prayer, in this place of unholiness.

Gaze of judgment cascades from the hollows of the Skull's eyes.

It makes a threatening noise from time to time, snapping its teeth together, but [{0}] remains calm, certain that the Skull will not hurt them.

Once the pious ritual was over, a solitary scarecrow stands in the place of the great Skull, showering in the mysterious light.
failureDesc:
[{0}] prays before the skull.

To whom they pray, we cannot hear.

For what they pray, we cannot hear.

We cannot know if that even was a prayer, in this place of unholiness.

Gaze of judgment cascades from the hollows of the Skull's eyes.

It makes a threatening noise from time to time, snapping its teeth together. [{0}] nervously glances at the skull, shuddering lightly from worry.

Once the pious ritual was over, a solitary scarecrow stands in the place of the great Skull, showering in the mysterious light.

dataList.behaveDesc: Which Sinner will loudly convey their will?
successDesc:
[{0}] begins to recite before the skull.

We cannot hear the contents of their recital, but it is calm and honest, as though they are confessing their sins.

A ray of light showers over [{0}], though there is no opening in the ceiling.

When the light hits [{0}], a crown of thorns, the same crown worn by the skull, lands itself above their head.

When [{0}]'s recital ends, every Sinner closes their eyes with a peaceful expression.
failureDesc:
[{0}] begins to recite before the skull.

We cannot hear the contents of their recital, but it is calm and honest, as though they are confessing their sins.

A ray of light showers over [{0}], though there is no opening in the ceiling.

When the light hits [{0}], a crown of thorns, the same crown worn by the skull, lands itself above their head.

[{0}] briefly writhes in pain as the thorns of the crown begin digging into their scalp; but the pain is transient.

After a moment passes, [{0}] closes their eyes as their expression lightens, as though they came to a certain realization.

successDesc:
{0} approached the gnomes who were busily packing away at the gifts.

They stared at {0} with blank expressions for a moment, before raising their tools sky-high in unison.

'Human-ome!!'

'We were runnin' pretty low on human supply-ome! How timely-ome!!'

'Let's take 'em-ome!'

The gnomes surrounded {0} and quickly began packing the Sinner into a gift box before we had the chance to do anything.

We quickly grabbed the box {0} was presently getting stuffed into and escaped the scene.

{0} seems pretty shaken up, which seems like a reasonable response given that they were almost turned into a gift.

{0} approached the gnomes who were busily packing away at the gifts.

They stared at {0} with blank expressions for a moment, before raising their tools sky-high in unison.

'Human-ome!!'

'We were runnin' pretty low on human supply-ome! How timely-ome!!'

'Let's take 'em-ome!'

The gnomes surrounded {0} and quickly began packing the Sinner into a gift box before we had the chance to do anything.

We quickly grabbed the box {0} was presently getting stuffed into and escaped the scene.

{0} seems pretty shaken up, which seems like a reasonable response given that they were almost turned into a gift.
failureDesc:
{0} approached the gnomes who were busily packing away at the gifts.

They stared at {0} with blank expressions for a moment, before raising their tools sky-high in unison.

'Human-ome!!'

'We were runnin' pretty low on human supply-ome! How timely-ome!!'

'Let's take 'em-ome!'

The gnomes surrounded {0} and quickly began packing the Sinner into a gift box before we had the chance to do anything.

We immediately rushed toward the gnomes, trying to rescue {0}, but...

{0} was already turned into a gift...

successDesc:
The wooden floorboards creak with {0}'s every step.

Lights surrounding the bed dance ominously, as though to warn us to not approach it.

{0} carefully leans down to take a look under the bed.

There's a snuffed lantern and a candlestick, both toppled over.

Our worst fears are nowhere to be seen.

Nothing lives under the bed.

The wooden floorboards creak with {0}'s every step.

Lights surrounding the bed dance ominously, as though to warn us to not approach it.

{0} carefully leans down to take a look under the bed.

There's a snuffed lantern and a candlestick, both toppled over.

Our worst fears are nowhere to be seen.

Nothing lives under the bed.
failureDesc:
The wooden floorboards creak with {0}'s every step.

Lights surrounding the bed dance ominously, as though to warn us to not approach it.

{0} carefully leans down to take a look under the bed.

The darkness there, which we were convinced by our curiosity to peer into, is a suffocating quiet.

{0} sits there, complefely frozen in their hunched posture, before slowly stepping away from the bed.

Something scratches the floorboards. As if on cue, we immediately turn around and scramble out of that room.

A monster lives under the bed.
